channel.title: [PI] Strange Client Error from Nothing?
channel.description: So i have tried and tried time after time to solve this problem from restoring my client files to going through my client file by file and I can't find the damn fix. I thought it was a computer problem and so I rebooted my computer thinking it was... My computer hardware or software was corrupted so I had to recover everything and debug the hardware. I have no clue what the fuck this means but if someone could help me I would be eve rmore greatful to you. Thanks. [code]602 Animation Amount: 13798 508 Object Amount: 38424 602 NPC Amount: 11257 java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at client.getChatColor(client.java:113) at RSInterface.ColorChanger(RSInterface.java:238) at RSInterface.unpack(RSInterface.java:1246) at client.startUp(client.java:9882) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:78) at client.run(client.java:6352) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]

item.title: [PI] Strange Client Error from Nothing?
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

So i have tried and tried time after time to solve this problem from restoring my client files to going through my client file by file and I can’t find the damn fix. I thought it was a computer problem and so I rebooted my computer thinking it was… My computer hardware or software was corrupted so I had to recover everything and debug the hardware. I have no clue what the fuck this means but if someone could help me I would be eve rmore greatful to you. Thanks. 602 Animation Amount: 13798 508 Object Amount: 38424 602 NPC Amount: 11257 java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at client.getChatColor(client.java:113) at RSInterface.ColorChanger(RSInterface.java:238) at RSInterface.unpack(RSInterface.java:1246) at client.startUp(client.java:9882) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:78) at client.run(client.java:6352) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
